name: Cmp-arduino-1678
tagline: Public code for use in the Citrus Circuits offseason arduino competition.
body:
### Citrus Arduino Library
This library contains all of the necessary elements for the Citrus Circuits offseason Arduino competition. To download it, install [git](http://git-scm.com/) and use the following commands in git bash:

```
$ cd your_repo_root/repo_name
$ git fetch origin
$ git checkout gh-pages
```

Alternatively, click _download .zip_ above

***

### Installation
First, install the [Arduino IDE](http://www.arduino.cc/en/Main/Software) by clicking the download link for your computer and going through the wizard.
If you downloaded the files in a zip file, unzip it into a directory. Open the main.ino file and start programming.

***

### Drivers
To upload code onto the Arduino, you will need to install the drivers for communication. Refer to [this guide](http://www.arduino.cc/en/guide/windows#toc4) for instructions.

***

### Authors and Contributors
Please feel free to contact us with any questions.
+@KyleStach1678 - kylestach99@gmail.com
+@steampunc
+@amannababanana
